alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 4:39AM AKST until January 14 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Storm total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibilities reduced to a half-mile at times. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Southwesterly winds have increased and visibilities have become reduced along portions of the inland Kuskokwim Delta this morning (hovering around one mile). Visibilities may drop to one-half mile at times during the next couple of hours this morning before conditions begin to improve as the storm system continues moving off to the northeast. Visibilities have already began to improve along the coast and Nunivak Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
